meanings.definition: Resembling an orchid in appearance or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The flower had an orchidlike beauty with its delicate petals and vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with orchidlike flowers, adding a touch of elegance to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: She joked that his tie looked orchidlike, as if he was trying to blend in with the flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her movements on the dance floor were orchidlike, graceful and mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the orchidlike essence of nature, showcasing its unique and delicate features.
